content: I loved the spicy pork bibimbap, and I actually got it two weeks ago, on a Thursday, if I recall correctly. It was a rainy day, so I was happy to stay indoors and enjoy the food. Anyway, back to the fajitas - I think I'll stick to bell peppers and onions, but I do like a bit of heat, so I might add some diced jalapeños or serrano peppers to give it a kick.
